title: Luxury New Home utilities and internet included 1 bdrm / 1 bthrm
posting_body: ['New construction furnished, Move-in ready home (carriage home) available beginning Oct 15 and includes basic cable and internet and all utilities power, gas and water for $1700/month ($1400 rent + $300/ month utilities).', 'Located in Tucker, Ga just minutes from 285 and 78 and the Stone Mountain Park.', 'Easily accessible to Marta and within 2 miles of the newly built Hugh Howell Marketplace that includes a Publix, Anticos Sporto, Buffalo Wild Wings, Piedmont Urgent Care, pet grooming and lots of other retail stores.', 'Tastefully appointed this beautiful and spacious home is located in a culdesac gated property in a country club upscale subdivision (all images are of the property).', 'Your new home away from home includes all the amenities needed for a very comfortable shorter or longer term stay including typical kitchen small appliances, flatware, cutlery and linens needed throughout.', 'This elegant home has stainless steel appliances - full sized refrigerator with side by side doors, 5 burner gas stove, dishwasher, and above the stove microwave.', 'Kitchen features white quartz countertops with large black farmhouse styled double sink with garbage disposal.', 'White kitchen cabinetry is plentiful with satin nickel handles/knobs.', 'Separated laundry room has full-sized side by side white washer and dryer.', 'Kitchen, dining room, and living room flooring is a faux marble porcelain.', 'Spacious bathroom features black marble flooring and jetted jacuzzi bathtub surround and gray marble countertop.', 'Bthrm has jetted soaking tub separate from huge stand up shower with rainfall, shower panel and shower wand.', 'Shower also has shower bench and shower nook.', 'Bedroom with plush carpet is 15x16 easily able to accommodate as large as a king sized bed.', 'Home is perfect for short or longer-term executive rental.', 'Dining room and bedroom spaces have smart TVs.', 'Deposit is equal to 1 months rent.', 'Pets are a possibility.', 'Please call me for further information.', 'Thanks for your interest']
